IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_GI_RollingForcastProcessResult' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_GI_RollingForcastProcessResult] GO CREATE VIEW v_GI_RollingForcastProcessResult AS -- 祖產(BASE) WITH tmpCalculateBaseResult AS ( SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'祖產(Base)' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear AS FinYear, quota.SubFinPeriodID, calResult.CalculateResult AS Amount, 7 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseQuotaResult quota INNER JOIN [dbo].[CalculateRollingForecastBase]() calResult ON quota.CompanyID = calResult.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = calResult.WorkGroupID AND quota.SubFinperiodID = calResult.Finperiod AND quota.FinYear = calResult.Year ), -- 預估業績 tmpEstimatePerformance AS ( SELECT calcResult.CompanyID, N'預估業績' AS ForecastType, calcResult.WorkGroupID, calcResult.FinYear, calcResult.SubFinPeriodID, ISNULL(OppMRC.Amount,0) + ISNULL(OppNotMRC.Amount,0) + ISNULL(calcResult.Amount,0) AS Amount, 8 AS OrderSeq FROM tmpCalculateBaseResult calcResult FULL JOIN v_BaseOpportunityMRCResult OppMRC ON OppMRC.CompanyID = calcResult.CompanyID AND OppMRC.WorkGroupID = calcResult.WorkGroupID AND OppMRC.FinYear = calcResult.FinYear AND OppMRC.SubFinPeriodID = calcResult.SubFinPeriodID FULL JOIN v_BaseOpportunityNotMRCResult OppNotMRC ON calcResult.CompanyID = OppNotMRC.CompanyID AND calcResult.WorkGroupID = OppNotMRC.WorkGroupID AND calcResult.FinYear = OppNotMRC.FinYear AND calcResult.SubFinPeriodID = OppNotMRC.SubFinPeriodID
), tmpPerformance AS ( SELECT ISNULL(billing.CompanyID,estimatePerformance.CompanyID) AS CompanyID, N'業績數' AS ForecastType, ISNULL(billing.WorkGroupID,estimatePerformance.WorkGroupID) AS WorkGroupID, ISNULL(billing.FinYear,estimatePerformance.FinYear) AS FinYear, ISNULL(billing.SubFinperiodID,estimatePerformance.SubFinperiodID) AS SubFinperiodID, IIF(ISNULL(billing.Amount,0) = 0,estimatePerformance.Amount,billing.Amount) AS Amount, 9 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseBillingResult billing FULL JOIN tmpEstimatePerformance estimatePerformance ON billing.CompanyID = estimatePerformance.CompanyID AND billing.WorkGroupID = estimatePerformance.WorkGroupID AND billing.FinYear = estimatePerformance.FinYear AND billing.SubFinPeriodID = estimatePerformance.SubFinPeriodID ), tmpAchievmentRate AS ( SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'當月達成率' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear, quota.SubFinperiodID, CASE WHEN quota.Amount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ISNULL(performance.Amount,0) / quota.Amount END AS Amount, 10 AS OrderSeq FROM v_BaseQuotaResult quota FULL JOIN tmpPerformance performance ON quota.CompanyID = performance.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = performance.WorkGroupID AND quota.FinYear = performance.FinYear AND quota.SubFinperiodID = performance.SubFinperiodID ), tmpColumnReName AS( SELECT 'Period01' AS SubFinperiodID, '1/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period02' AS SubFinperiodID, '2/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period03' AS SubFinperiodID, '3/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period04' AS SubFinperiodID, '4/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period05' AS SubFinperiodID, '5/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period06' AS SubFinperiodID, '6/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period07' AS SubFinperiodID, '7/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period08' AS SubFinperiodID, '8/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period09' AS SubFinperiodID, '9/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period10' AS SubFinperiodID, '10/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period11' AS SubFinperiodID, '11/01' AS ReNameCol UNION SELECT 'Period12' AS SubFinperiodID, '12/01' AS ReNameCol ) SELECT t.CompanyID, t.ForecastType, t.WorkGroupID, t.FinYear, CAST(CAST(t.FinYear AS NVARCHAR(4)) + '/' + tmpReName.ReNameCol AS DateTime) AS SubFinperiodID, t.Amount, t.OrderSeq FROM( -- Quota SELECT * FROM v_BaseQuotaResult UNION -- Billing SELECT * FROM v_BaseBillingResult UNION -- Billing MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseBillingMRCResult UNION -- Opportunity MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseOpportunityMRCResult UNION -- Opportunity Not MRC SELECT * FROM v_BaseOpportunityNotMRCResult UNION -- Base SELECT * FROM tmpCalculateBaseResult UNION -- 預估業績(Estimate Performance) SELECT * FROM tmpEstimatePerformance UNION -- 業績(Performance) SELECT * FROM tmpPerformance UNION -- 當月達成率(Achievement rate) SELECT * FROM tmpAchievmentRate -- 當月累積達成率(Summary) UNION SELECT quota.CompanyID, N'當月累計達成率' AS ForecastType, quota.WorkGroupID, quota.FinYear, quota.SubFinperiodID, CASE WHEN ISNULL(quota.SummaryValue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ISNULL(performance.SummaryValue,0) / ISNULL(quota.SummaryValue,0) END AS Amount , 11 AS OrderSeq FROM ( SELECT *,SUM(Amount) Over(PARTITION by Finyear,WorkgroupID,CompanyID,ForecastType ORDER BY SubFinPeriodID) AS SummaryValue FROM v_BaseQuotaResult ) quota LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *,SUM(Amount) Over(PARTITION by Finyear,WorkgroupID,CompanyID,ForecastType ORDER BY SubFinperiodID) AS SummaryValue FROM tmpPerformance performance ) performance ON quota.CompanyID = performance.CompanyID AND quota.WorkGroupID = performance.WorkGroupID AND quota.FinYear = performance.FinYear AND quota.SubFinperiodID = performance.SubFinperiodID UNION SELECT CompanyID,ForecastType,WorkGroupID,FinYear,SubFinperiodID,Amount,OrderSeq FROM( SELECT CompanyID, N'預估Base調整' ForecastType, WorkGroupID, Year AS FinYear, 6 AS OrderSeq, ISNULL(Period01,0) AS Period01, ISNULL(Period02,0) AS Period02, ISNULL(Period03,0) AS Period03, ISNULL(Period04,0) AS Period04, ISNULL(Period05,0) AS Period05, ISNULL(Period06,0) AS Period06, ISNULL(Period07,0) AS Period07, ISNULL(Period08,0) AS Period08, ISNULL(Period09,0) AS Period09, ISNULL(Period10,0) AS Period10, ISNULL(Period11,0) AS Period11, ISNULL(Period12,0) AS Period12 FROM LUMManualForecastAdjustment )t UNPIVOT( Amount FOR SubFinperiodID IN (t.[Period01],t.[Period02],t.[Period03],t.[Period04],t.[Period05],t.[Period06],t.[Period07],t.[Period08],t.[Period09],t.[Period10],t.[Period11],t.[Period12]) ) pv ) t INNER JOIN tmpColumnReName tmpReName ON t.SubFinperiodID = tmpReName.SubFinperiodID
